channel.title: Bug Bounty on less on sec
channel.description: Recent content in Bug Bounty on less on sec

item.title: I hacked the Dutch government and all I got was this lousy t-shirt
item.description: Recently, I was awarded a cool t-shirt from the Dutch government for disclosing and reporting a vulnerability under their National Cyber Security Centre responsible disclosure program. Lousy t-shirt I was able to discover a vulnerability in one of the government’s websites.
